# RF EONR Shapley Valus

```{r }
set.seed(782433)

rf_eonr_shap <-
  readRDS("Results/rf_eonr_results.rds") %>%
  mutate(eonr_rf = list(
    ranger(
      paste0(
        "nrate ~ ",
        paste0(x_vars, collapse = "+")
      ) %>%
        formula(),
      data = eonr_data,
      num.trees = 300
    )
  )) %>%
  mutate(shap_values = list(
    get_shap_values(
      data = eonr_data,
      x_vars = x_vars,
      trained_model = eonr_rf
    )
  ))

saveRDS(rf_eonr_shap, "Results/rf_eonr_shap.rds")
```
